sect1.title: Insert Images
sect1.para: From the main editor screen click on the insert image icon and the windows will popup allowing you to choose and image.

callout.para: Use this the pull down classes menu to choose the category that you wish to select an image from. Once you have selected the required option you will then be presented a with a list of images from this category. By selecting the required image the image properties will be populated ready to insert the image.
these fields are used to set how the image is going to be layed out on the page. Setting these will change how the tag is going to be build which will impact on the display of the image.

If the selected image is not included in the current image gallery you are able to upload an image. This image that is uploaded will be attached to the currect category. Populate the description and the name of the file that you wish to upload. Click the upload button and the file will be uploaded and inserted into the image gallery.

note.para: If no description is entered, then the name of the file will be used as the description.

callout.para: This area is populated when an image is selected from the image list or the preview button is selected.

sect1.title: Link Documents
sect1.para: From the main editor screen click on the anchor icon and the windows will popup allowing you to choose and image.

callout.para: these fields are used to set how the image is going to be layed out on the page. Setting these will change how the <a> tag is going to be build which will impact on the display of the image.

Use this the pull down classes menu to choose the category that you wish to select an image from. Once you have selected the required option you will then be presented a with a list of images from this category. By selecting the required image the image properties will be populated ready to insert the image.

If the selected document is not included in the current category you are able to upload a document. This document that is uploaded will be attached to the currect category. Populate the description and the name of the file that you wish to upload. Click the upload button and the file will be uploaded and inserted into the document list.

note.para: If no description is entered, then the name of the file will be used as the description.
